title: Drawing, "Birch Trees", ca. 1880
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on blue-gray paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. F. Hopkinson Smith
description: Vertical rectangle.  A forest scene with tall birch trees in the foreground extending beyond the limits of the composition, above.  Tree-stumps, piles of cut wood, lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Birch Trees", ca. 1880.
ca. 1880. Brush and watercolor, graphite on blue-gray paper. Gift of Mrs. F. Hopkinson Smith. 1923-41-25.
